scripts.build:copy-wasm: echo 'WASM handled by Cloudflare wasm_modules binding - skipping copy'
scripts.build:obfuscate: mkdir -p dist-obf && if [ "$SKIP_OBFUSCATION" = "1" ] || [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then echo 'Skipping obfuscation (SKIP_OBFUSCATION or CI set) - copying files'; cp dist/*.js dist-obf/; else for file in dist/*.js; do base=$(basename "$file"); if [ "$base" = "entry.js" ]; then cp "$file" dist-obf/"$base"; else javascript-obfuscator "$file" --output dist-obf/"$base" --compact true --target browser --control-flow-flattening false --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.5 --string-array-encoding base64 --string-array-index-shift false --string-array-rotate false --string-array-shuffle false --string-array-wrappers-count 0 --identifier-names-generator mangled-shuffled --self-defending true --dead-code-injection false --numbers-to-expressions false --simplify false --split-strings false --debug-protection false --unicode-escape-sequence false --log false; fi; done; fi
scripts.build:ci: npm run gen:wrangler-ci && npm run build
scripts.publish:ci: npm run build:ci && wrangler publish --config wrangler.ci.toml
scripts.build: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:copy-wasm && npm run build:obfuscate
